website_summaries.verdict: Improve rear visibility without breaking the bank.
pros: Camera sees a 110° view and is illuminated by 6 LEDs
Night vision is supported as well
Intelligent switch allows you to adjust guides and enable warnings with one button
Wireless range is 82-100 ft. in open areas
cons: Video quality can be choppy in comparison to alternatives

customer_reviews.title: Great price, perfect product
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazin deal. I was skeptical due 2the price bein so low. I got it as a gift 4my dad 4a ford f350 BIG truck so he could c the ball when towing. It workd amazing + he can see everything else behind him too. Screens clear, was quick to install. He luvs it so im happy :0) i will purch from them Again. It arrived quickly n i couldnt beat the price. All round awesome.
customer_reviews.author: shinaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Nice System
customer_reviews.text: This system came with everything I needed to set it up properly. Having the option to use either the wireless or wired interface was really helpful. I used the power plug (lighter) outlet for power to the display and wired the camera to the reverse tail light using components provided. All I needed was a pair of pliers to crimp the connections. Also, I had a few questions and their customer service was excellent! They replied to my emails quickly and answered my questions thoroughly. It has been a pleasure working with them. The picture is great and the LED lights really let me see what's behind me at night.
customer_reviews.author: Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backup camera for the purpose of being able to backup my Expedition and attach it to my Travel Trailer myself without needing my wife out with me to align up the hitch. I went with a wireless option as I didn't want to have to run a video cable the full length of my car. The picture on the camera is clear and I was able to attach the trailer for the first time by myself. My only complaint is that the 3M tape that holds the monitor to the dash didn't want to adhere to my dash, after a couple of attempts I was able to get it attached and it stayed put.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey D

customer_reviews.title: Not only reliable product, also reliable service
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the reliable product Easy to install. Installation on chevy equinox From my choice I decided to connect the camera so that it will work always and not just in reverse. And works fine. tip: Secure the wires so that they do not hit the sharp parts of the vehicle body Note: Inside the package there is a wired installation kit for those who do not want to use Wireless And something important: the supplier answers almost immediately On questions and emails
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Tiede

customer_reviews.title: Installation
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly how I installed it. First, I checked all the items, saw that they were complete, reviewed the installation manual and proceeded. First I placed the camera, on top of the back plate (back) Then I made the connection of it, with the reversing light cables, then I installed the monitor in the central part of the flash, place a small antenna that comes with the package, then I connected the same with the cable that comes with a switch , in cigarette lighter hockey. Finally I started the car engine, put the reverse and woww Surprise, it works perfectly, That is all in honor of the truth. It is magnificent and sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Azize Touma

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice product. I do a lot of Tournament Fishing, so having a camera is almost a must for hooking up my boat. Monitor mounted perfect on my dash and its not to big that it blocks your view. Wireless is the way to go. Took about 10 minutes to hook up. If your looking for a great little camera, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Team Blazer

customer_reviews.title: First one artived broken, but immediately fixed by shipper
customer_reviews.text: Got it quick but that's about it. Wireless signal weak. Camera is internally out of alignment. No matter what I do the camera will. Or look straight back. The screen fuzzes out all the time while in reverse. I would not recommend but it was o my 30.00 so you get what u pay for. Update** they contacted me and sent me a new one. Looks great. I haven't had a chance to hook it up yet, but I look forward to using. As far as I'm concerned they have made it right
customer_reviews.author: jennifer oliver

customer_reviews.title: Very easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Took less than 15 minutes to install. Picture is good, but like most wireless cameras, often picks up stray signals on the monitor. A good value overall.
customer_reviews.author: Todd R. Rushing

customer_reviews.title: This products works great. The response time of the camera upon shifting ...
customer_reviews.text: This products works great. The response time of the camera upon shifting gear to reverse is in within a second. The quality of the video output is around 720p. This is a great addon to the safety feature of an old car without a backup camera. It would be nice if they can include a quick splice connector in the box in-order to connect the transmitter to the reverse light wires.
customer_reviews.author: Seshagiri

customer_reviews.title: Emmako backup camera, you'll wonder why you didn't do it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backup camera for my pickup truck last week. Installation was pretty quick and not a hard job to do it all. Having a backup camera makes it so much quicker to load/unload my trailer now, I wonder why I hadn't done it earlier. Monitor is clear and finding a spot to mount it took only a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: gsxr-rider137

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I added it to the front of my truck for closeups during parking in tight spots. Awesome camera! (NOTE: this did cause interference with my XM radio. I removed the transmitter antenna, and the receiver still received a perfect picture, and the reduced signal no longer interfered with my XM radio reception.)
customer_reviews.author: Ready2Reel

customer_reviews.title: A Heck of a Deal
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on the back of my older Suburban and it has worked as expected. The wireless signal is a little week and the picture cuts out once in a while because of this (otherwise I would have given it 5 stars). I ended up soldering an additional 4" of wire to the tiny (1 inch long) antenna that is at the back of the vehicle. That helped the signal, but I probably should have added twice the length of wire.
customer_reviews.author: Car Guy

customer_reviews.title: Difficult install
customer_reviews.text: The description and reviews imply that this is a simple install. If you don't understand wiring it is difficult if not impossible to figure out how to install. This is NOT something you simply place on your dashboard and plug into a cigarette lighter..
customer_reviews.author: John Savarese

customer_reviews.title: This camera works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This camera was easy to install in my motor home and the picture is very clear and easy to see. I hooked it up to always be on when I am driving so I can see my trailer. I connected it to the rear license plate light so all I have to do is turn on the headlights to get it to work. I hooked the camera on the license plate bracket. The hardest part was finding wires under the dash of the motor home to connect the monitor to but it wasn't really very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry R

customer_reviews.title: Okay for price
customer_reviews.text: First unit received, the camera did not work. Had to return. Second unit worked okay and had good image except color was intermittant. Picture okay when vehicle at rest. Refresher rate on the wireless cannot keep up with movement of the vehicle, so it is actually useless when backing. It is okay at very slow movement and will help only to tell initially if something is directly behind you before you begin to move.
customer_reviews.author: Ron2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Value
customer_reviews.text: I loved the value of this great camera system. For this price I might've expected something that was only OK, and difficult to customize, but the reality far exceeded my expectations. It was easy to install, and works perfectly. Now, I've easily solved the problem of backing up my huge truck. It's as clear and reliable as the factory-installed backup camera in my other car. I would highly recommend this camera to others, and Emmako took really good care of me.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy install
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great. Clear picture even at night. Attached plus lead to backup light, ground to ground. Plugged monitor into cigarette lighter module. Monitor turns off when WiFi not connected to camera. One note, when adjusting monitor brightness, contrast, etc, must cycle through all menus and click on the reset menu or the settings do not hold.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I am a little spoiled having the backup camera's on the newer cars. I have two older cars that do not have the camera so I had to try this camera system out. It is perfect for what I need! It was relatively easy to install and has worked flawlessly since installed. I also think customer service is the greatest. They checked with me to see if I installed it and how I like their product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: back up camera
customer_reviews.text: easy to install. the camera itself has two wires. a black grounded to the frame and a hot red to the back up bulb. the monitor simply plugs into the cigarette lighter. and your done, voila. plus the free additional camera was not hard to take. the sales rep, Luna was very helpful during the whole process. Thank you, Tom
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M Laehn

customer_reviews.title: Good and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: The camera and video quality are good and easy to install. I have connected the camera on tail light line instead of break light line and can get video anytime if I want to see rearview. There are brief video interruption in some area probably due to radio frequency interference. I tried to adjust the camera antenna position and the interference is improved. Good product with all necessary accessaries. If it has video recording capability it will be perfect for other application.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Low price but quality like expensive camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to install and good quality picture. Gives clear pictures when reversing. Price is so low, you wonder about the quality, to my surprise it performs like a much expensive camera. It comes with all wiring, and parts to install wireless or hardwired, all cables included. Customer support was excellent, they responded quickly to emails. I would recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: yogi

customer_reviews.title: Started disappointed  ended up pleased
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble with the camera . On my older . But contacted seller and sent new camera very quickly . What a great picture as good and bettter than some ive view that were factory installed . No interference and decent instructions. MORE IMPORTANT THEY STOOD BEHIND PRODUCT .more than other things i have purchased
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Very clear camera
customer_reviews.text: Although the screen is smaller than I would prefer but it’s very clear. With the power of the internet they should post an installation instructions on YouTube or something to make it easier for anybody to install. The installation was a breeze after watching some YouTube videos. For the price you can’t go wrong with this wireless backup camera.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Just installed the Emmako Wireless Backup Camera ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Just installed the Emmako Wireless Backup Camera and Monitor on my truck. Bright color picture in monitor, with good view angle. The Monitor bracket is a plus - I was able to stick it onto my dash and pivot the Monitor for easy viewing. Wireless signal is solid with no interruptions. Not hard to install either. Only wish I got this before I took out my neighbor’s mailbox with my rear fender! Solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product comes with clear instructions and everything you need to do the basic install. Because my car only has one cigarette lighter up front that I plug a phone charger to, the cigarette lighter adapter provided in the kit to power the monitor didn’t work out for me. I bought a separate fuse tap (not included in this kit) to power the monitor. To power the camera, I tapped in to the reverse light wires with the quick taps provided and I really like how the camera bracket can be hidden behind the license plate. Overall great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: patrickc808

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless camera installed it on my GMC crew cab
customer_reviews.text: Great wireless camera installed it on my GMC crew cab. Best part is not having to run wires from the cab to the rear bumper.Easy to install..
customer_reviews.author: Ugli1

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect/mismatched parts
customer_reviews.text: The output from the camera on this is a 5 pin, but the extension that I'm supposed to plug it into (according to the install video) is a 4 pin......I don't know what to do besides return it and by an American made one I can trust to have the correct parts.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Emmako Wireless Backup Camera
customer_reviews.text: Put 5000 miles on a cross country trip with the Emmako wireless backup camera installed. Worked every time we needed to backup from rest stops, gas stations, restaurants, etc. Installation was straight forward on a Toyota Minivan with supplied materials. I used several online videos that showed how to access my vehicles backup lights. I added zip ties to help hold down the wires before replacing the plastic cover on the back tailgate. So far so good but I have my fingers crossed. 8-20-2019 Bumped up a star for good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: MStar

customer_reviews.title: It was good until...
customer_reviews.text: Dead , doesnt work anymore, what the heck?? Bad customer service too. This product sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t have a backup camera this is a must have.Easy to install and have everything you need. The night vision is good(attached picture) It make it easy to watch what is behind the car and avoid costly accidents for the price you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: CY

customer_reviews.title: I love this backup camera!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about the quality when I ordered it. But I was very surprised with it and how easy it was to install in my Honda Element. The screen lights up very bright and easy to see in all times of the day. I will be ordering another one for my husbands truck!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to install. However the cigarette lighter plug did not work. Checked the fuse and it was good so it’s the plug itself. No big deal, I hardwired it in instead but the sticky tape used to hold the monitor to the base failed immediately. Lasted less than 24 hours. Came out the first morning and it was just hanging and I had to hold it in place while I drive so it wasn’t swinging everywhere. Pretty disappointed but I guess you get what you pay for. Going to try gluing it to the base.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Poor Instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instruction video referred to in the instructions will not load. Not sure which wires to connect on tail light for power or use single power source from the lighter adapter power both display unit and camera. There are a lot of wires for a wireless system.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I just purchased a Dodge Caravan and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product.I just purchased a Dodge Caravan and after installing this camera I feel I can safely back up. The picture is crystal clear even at nighttime. I would recommend this as a great add on to any vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: seajay17

customer_reviews.title: It was an easy installation, I connected the power to my license ...
customer_reviews.text: The item shipped on time. It was an easy installation, I connected the power to my license plate light so I could turn it on whenever I wanted instead of just when in reverse. The camera is adjustable so i can move it around for trailer hookup vs. regular backing up. So far everything works nicely with a good clear view of everything behind the vehicle. I maybe purchasing sever more for my other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: rodney

customer_reviews.title: poor chineese product
customer_reviews.text: this is the second one of these ordered. The first one worked good and was as described. This one which is supposed to be exact same thing is totally different and not worth having. Nothing is right from attachments to function, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Ok!
customer_reviews.text: It would be very helpful if you include quick connect wire connections in the kit to connect to the backup light on the tail light. Had to reposition wireless transmitters for best results and to stop the flickering on the screen. If I had more time to install I would have hard wired.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Stache

customer_reviews.title: More than you asked for
customer_reviews.text: The item works better than I was expecting due to the low price,. You should advertise the extra mounting base and the included cable sets that allows it to run either wireless or wired. I was happy to find these items even though the amazon listing has no mention of them being included. Also perhaps mention the second video input, that is not mentioned either. These items alone would have made the choice faster and easier to make. Down side is the terrible wire splice connectors. Threw them away and used better ones so far it has been a great addition to a car with blind spots when backing
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Backup Camera
customer_reviews.text: Pros, definitely the price, secondly picture quality and adjust-ability, easy install. Most difficult part was running wire to the backup lights for power, but otherwise, functions wireless without any problems thus fare, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive backup camera option.
customer_reviews.text: The only hard part with this was splicing the camera power cable into the reverse light power on our car. Other than that it works well. I assume this is much easier tan doing a full install back up camera. It works for us.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: The worst!!
customer_reviews.text: Product didn’t even work and neither did the replacement... this was a Father’s Day gift that I had to pay twice to have professional installed to not work both times ... the installation place didn’t charge me the 2nd time however still $103 but amazon only gave me a $50 gift card to spend on Amazon.. did not want to ever shop here again after the hours spent in the phone to try and get this problem fixed .. bottom line Father’s Day was a bust!!! Thank you amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: This product doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 days. Always “flickered” picture constantly went black. You can’t adjust the contrast to make image viewable. Don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: D Day Fan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This product gets great reviews so I would love to them to send me a free replacement. I installed the product on an F-150. The image flickers on and off and is extremely grainy and hard to see even when it is on. I double checked all connections and then even had my local Ford dealership take a look at it for me to see if they could see anything wrong. I really want a backup camera for safety as there are small children all around my house. I really wish I could say nice things about the product but I just can't.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great at a great price. Easy to install if you have any experience wiring things up in a car. Works good at night. I installed wired rather than wireless for a more stable picture.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Moore

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Junk!! The video image is choppy And comes in and out. I wasted my money on something that will end up in the land fill. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: R. Freestone

customer_reviews.title: Very good picture considering the low price
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture considering the low price. Easily as good as those I have seen in rentals. Very plain, easy to follow instructions. I finally decided to have a professional installer do it (I am in my 70's) which added $110 to cost, but at a total of $150 installed I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Glynn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless connection
customer_reviews.text: Monitor is easy to install. Back up camera is simple, wire just have to connect to ground and reverse light. I have no issues after using it for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: System showed up as promised. Very essy to install. I set it up for constant display. Very clear screen, nice wide view. Great value for the money. Highly recommend. Like the on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Dover

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Received on time! Relatively easy to install. Used the provided wire tap connectors initially. They did not work as the wire from transmitter is not thick enough. After not seeing the light on the transmitter turn on when the van was in reverse, I went with the old fashioned twist and electrical tape method. That worked perfectly! Day-time picture is very clear. Night vision is good, but slightly grainy. I would buy again, but all our other cars have built-in cameras. :)
customer_reviews.author: K.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product and support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit for my father in law as his backing skills are not what they used to be and driving a 2500 longbed it was needed. We had a little issue with the first one we received glitching, but Emmako was on point resolving our issue! Immediate response and took action right away with new transmitter in a couple days! Product is now great, customer service and support top notch, price perfect...what more could you ask for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Field of view incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: Camera works as advertised, except for the field of view. Instead of 135 degrees, the angle is 75 degrees. Also, the boresight of the camera is clearly off centered. The two issues are probably related. Not useful as a backup camera. I am contacting the seller and will update.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great image, Value, and options to fit a variety of install scenarios!!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my Son's 2006 Ford Escape. Included lots of mounting options and a few install diagrams so you can hook this up to operate in a variety of different ways. Great camera and picture. Camera is adjustable so you can get the right angle!!! Pictures to come of finish install!
customer_reviews.author: Jmewmaw

customer_reviews.title: Better then the others in this price range
customer_reviews.text: Is a great camera. I spent the same amount on a different wired camera and it was defective and wasted 3 hours of install time - then I bought this camera and it worked perfect when powered on - and being wireless it took much less time to install. Display is great.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L

customer_reviews.title: he hooked it up and said it was very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands truck, he hooked it up and said it was very easy to install. Works great he loves it...
customer_reviews.author: sheila101551

customer_reviews.title: very easy installation on 02 silverado
customer_reviews.text: I've installed a stereo with backup cam in my wife's car last week took 2 days but I did this cam on my 02 silverado in about 15 mins hardest thing about the install was trying to figure out where to put monitor vid quality is excellent night vision was really good and installation was really simple . I would recommend this product in a hartbeat going to order one for my son's truck after the holidays
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolute garbage. You get what you pay for yes it is easy and cheap to install, but not exactly what is shown. The picture constantly cuts out like a bad vhs tape. I’ve messed with the receiver and transmitter so many times and nothing. If you want something cheap that barely works get this if you want something better please just spend the extra money, because you will regret it if you dont
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps not for the "faint of heart"
customer_reviews.text: I called customer support 3 times, asking about if the monitor would have a picture BEFORE installing and just with power. Nonsensical answers. I installed the entire system and still NO PICTURE. The instructions suggest a method by which one could secure a second system FOR FREE and I tried the method they described. A real waste of time, effort, and money. Plus I still need a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Vosburgh

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality 🤨
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is fair at best. I have it installed on a Acura TL and it acts like I have it installed on a semi. Picture keeps cutting in and out and gets static through the whole picture. Very disturbing when trying to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nilla56308

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price - Includes wired option as well
customer_reviews.text: Originally I didn't have high expectations for the camera due to the price, but honestly it doesn't get much better for $45. The directions were ok, the best thing is to just follow the diagram. I tested it out with a 9V battery before wiring into the rear taillights. I also liked that they gave you an extra cable to hardwire it if you didn't want the wireless version or if it didn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin P. Cabral

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst back up camera Whatever you do don’t waste your time or money on this piece of crap. Wireless range says 33’ but won’t go 10’ without glitching and poor picture quality. will be returning and purchasing a wired camera
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Wireless video is not consistent
customer_reviews.text: It works but the video is keep jumping many times. It is hard to see some time.
customer_reviews.author: TV

customer_reviews.title: Wireless
customer_reviews.text: Camera itself is a ok camera. Screen is big. My problem is with the wireless transmitter. It must catch some other type of nearby signals and tries to go on and off on its own. I have to manually shut it off
customer_reviews.author: dmitriy s.

customer_reviews.title: So far, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about this backup camera system because of the price but was very surprised at the picture quality, much better than my original backup system. Very easy to install and set up. Instructions were a little vague but was able to figure it out. This is not the top of the line but I am happy with this set-up so far and the price. I did hardwire it into a 2014 F150 and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Emmaco Rear view monitor, so very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the rear view monitor kit from Emmaco through Amazon. I would like people to know the kit is awesome. In 20 minutes after opening the box the unit was functioning fully and perfectly in my Mazda B2300 pickup. It works great and the price was very reasonable. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: William Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice system.
customer_reviews.text: Go wireless, so much easier than running a wire from the back to the dash of your vehicle. I am really impressed with the night vision, much better than more expensive units I tired in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Guy in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the money. Crisp and clear with great colour. Fairly simple to install. Recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Harold H.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I installed it on a F150 and it works great. It was easy to install the picture is easy to see. I did have an issue with the display in the truck. I contacted the company and they worked with me to send a replacement. They were responsive and easy to deal with. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: C Collum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great back up camera at a reasonable price. Everything you need, with clear instructions. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Very easy to install. The monitor picture does go in and out at times, but not enough to hinder function. Instructions were helpful, but the modes for the intelligent button weren't clear as to what was being adjusted- could be worded better.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Item came in with torn wires, and on the instructions for the set up, the youtube link does not work. NOT WORTH THE BUY GUYS. Save your money for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Hesham Mahmoud

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Easy to install. I even put it on my Pick-up truck to watch the Trailer hitch and hookup process, saves many may trips To the back to get the Ball and Hitch aligned. 5 Star product at this price Also, 5 Star Seller, fast service/delivery, and good support on the web with questions.. Thanks Pete
customer_reviews.author: upset

customer_reviews.title: Not very good wireless reach.
customer_reviews.text: Works, but be prepare to extend it closer to monitor. Not much wireless reach. Spliced additional wiring on mine to move closer due to horrible wireless stability. Works fine after extending close.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Huber

customer_reviews.title: We couldn't seem to get it to work quite right so she sent me a new transmitter and receiver and it worked perfect right away
customer_reviews.text: When I received this camera I installed it and it wasn't working just right in all situations. I contacted the seller and Elina went right to work helping me trouble shoot the problems I was having. We couldn't seem to get it to work quite right so she sent me a new transmitter and receiver and it worked perfect right away. A real pleasure to work with. I would use again. Gary
customer_reviews.author: Gary K.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these and they work great. The install was easy and the camera works well.
customer_reviews.author: csohayda

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation , great price
customer_reviews.text: So, lost a vehicle in an accident that had a factory backup camera. Bought another vehicle that had no backup camera. Wife and I decided that we missed having the camera so I searched Amazon. This product fit the bill nicely, price was right and screen was big enough but not too big. Installation was super easy! Love the T-type splice connectors that come in the kit. No cutting or taping wires. Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: FantasticFloyd

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with basic car knowledge. You can't beat it for the price. Turns on within 1 second of shifting to reverse. Great for hooking up trailer to hitch.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It works as well as expected.
customer_reviews.text: It works consistently but can be glitchy at times. I'm still adjusting the color/brightness/saturation. For the money it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bartprg

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Wired Backup Camera instead
customer_reviews.text: Flickering with lines sometime. Guideline not adequate to the distance. Nevertheless, it gives a view for backing up your car. For the price, it's ok, but don't expect it to be like a camera system from a newer stock car(monitor with clarity and size).
customer_reviews.author: kingkong6699

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Insall!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had other brand name cameras mounted which only lasted but a short while before they stopped working! This one by far is much better..... Very easy to install, Instruction manual is user friendly, I really like the way you can switch from rear view to front view, Night vision works great! The price was unbeatable! A+
customer_reviews.author: Steven G. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Lack of company support
customer_reviews.text: Product only worked for 3 weeks. Company did not offer to help.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Couple

customer_reviews.title: Effective and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: The product is listed as wireless with the warning that it wont work on pickup trucks wireless. It was actually close but not quite, it worked on top of the tailgate but not at the tag. Installation was pretty straight forward with the wiring and was basically like another one I installed for more money a couple of years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Wiscaver

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up with nice size and wonderful clear picture. If your car doesn't come with a backup camera then this is a great alternative! I wasn't sure which one to get but I'm glad I went with this company as they have been great with follow up after purchase to make sure I'm happy with it. I've only had it for a short time but so far I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Very clear picture.
customer_reviews.text: Best backup camera at any price! As you can see above I installed in my 2011 Toyota Corolla S very easily in about an hour. Consistent, no flickering picture under all levels of light. The screen is large enough without taking up to much space. The option for an additional front camera is also a plus. I highly recommended this unit at any price break!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Works good!
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money, very good support from manufacturer!
customer_reviews.author: BroBob

customer_reviews.title: Ok, when it actually works
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, when it works. The connection is really spotty, whenever I need it to work it doesn't want to.
customer_reviews.author: Steadypimpin

customer_reviews.title: Not great!
customer_reviews.text: Found that camera isnt waterproof everytime it rains all blurry
customer_reviews.author: James M. Baronetski

customer_reviews.title: Great for monitoring a trailer while driving.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to watch utility trailer with motorcycle on it while driving. Mounted camera inside car and pointed it to see out the rear window. Showed much more of what was going on than the rear view or side mirrors could. Worked perfectly. Now using in an older car that didn't come with a back up camera. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This unit is the perfect solution. It was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: So my husband finally got to install his backup camera in his Dodge Ram. He loves it! Where my husband works, the parking lot has very tight spaces to park. This unit is the perfect solution. It was easy to install. But heavier wires should be used from the camera to the backup light. It would cause less interference. The price was very fair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this for backing my truck up to a boat, tired of getting in and out to line up. Works well, night vision works well. Hardest part of job is finding where to connect into your reverse light to power up unit when going into reverse. I like that the unit can be wired or wireless depending on your application.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie S

customer_reviews.title: Unparalleled customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this last winter for when sander is on my truck to assist backing. Worked great for one year then the transmitter and monitor started to act up. The company sent me a whole new kit free of charge! Now it’s up and running again and I’m ready for the coming season !!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, I used the license plate circuit to power the camera and it worked right away. The picture is clear. I installed it on a 97 Roadtrek RV so I was worried about the wireless range - it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Dbrown

customer_reviews.title: Cuts out when installed wireless
customer_reviews.text: Continues to cut out as installed (wireless) will try hard wiring and see if it works better
customer_reviews.author: W. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Almost worked
customer_reviews.text: The wireless signal won’t reach the length of our van. Might work better on a smaller car.
customer_reviews.author: Ben R. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for about 2 months. Connected seller for replacement and no response.
customer_reviews.author: Dareth Von Gehr

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. But It blinks off and on ,signal strength weak
customer_reviews.author: Danny Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Wireless doesn’t work 100%
customer_reviews.text: The product works good wired. Wireless did not work it wanted to come on at random while going down the road. Ended up wiring it with supplied cable.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great functionality. Bought it for my old minivan, works great and I don’t need a modern infotainment. Easy to install, and product was exactly as described. Great price and a great buy. Would recommend. Better for old cars because now it is government mandated to have backup camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Khan

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera system for the price. Easy to install. Comes with a wire/cable for those wanting to hard wire the camera. Would recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Skeelym

customer_reviews.title: Rear camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera arrived fast and works great. I purchased a 12v adapter for it and connected it wired. I love the camera
customer_reviews.author: chris Blanschan

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backup camera for my 1996 Silverado. I got it so I can see when I'm close to an object when I'm backing in, and it works great. It didn't take very long to install, and I would highly recommend this product if you drive an old vehicle and want to make backing in a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: christy f

product_meta.title: AMTIFO HD 720P Wireless Backup Camera for Cars,SUVs,MiniVans,4.3 Inch Monitor Reversing System with Adjustable Rear/Front View Camera,Guide Lines On/Off,IP69 Waterproof
product_meta.description:
If you need an inexpensive wireless rear view camera 4.3 inch monitor system, the Amtifo camera system is just what you need. It has wide angle lens at 150 degrees and the transmitter is good for about 21ft.If you want the best wireless backup camera for under $50, you can’t go wrong with it!

Features:
1.Quick and simple setup，With satble signal under 21ft vehicle（Just fit Cars/SUVs/Minivans）for Reversing use
2,Switched mirrored/facing view makes the backup cameras can used for front facing camera.
3,Guide Lines on/off 
4,The system can add 2nd wireless camera 
5,Camera is IP69 waterproof
6,HD color and Super night version
7,With 2 years Warranty, free tech support and replacement service.

4.3 inch Monitor Specification：
Resolution: 960 (H) * 576 (V) Pixels
Signal format:Compatible with all signal formats
Rated Voltage: 9V - 35V, 500mA-20A

Camera Specification： 
Image sensor:1/3” CMOS
Video output: RCA connector, 1.0vp-p,750hm
Power: 9V-14V DC ,400mA-20A
Waterproof grade: IP69

Package Included：
1 x 4.3 inch Monitor
1 x Backup Camera
1 x Transmitter
1 x Cigarette Lighter Plug
1 x User Manual

★ NOTE ★ ：The backup camera system just used under 21ft vehicle(only compatible Cars/SUVs/MiniVans,not compatible to other vehicles such as pickup trucksTrailer Camper 5th Wheel because of signals interference
feature_bullets: ►Upgrade the latest HD camera with clear image. IP69 Waterproof HD 720P Super Night Vision Rear Camera With 6 LED light , so the image is also HD at day and night.
► The monitor can add 2nd wireless camera，you can adjust the camera rear or front view ( just cut the blue wire from the camera extension cord and the image will switch to front view image).

►The wireless built-in backup camera can be powered from the reverse lights, which will be used when reversing，or can be powered from the running lights/12V battery，which will be used when driving use. Wireless transmission stronger signals working distance up to vehicle under 21ft.

►Quick and simple setup. 4.3 inch LCD display monitor equipped with magnetic bracket,You can rotate it 360 degrees,can be mount the monitor on dash or windshield. and plug in into your cigarette power outlet. The camera uses your license plate screws to mount it and needn't drill a hole.

►A professional instruction sheet comes in the package. Also: With the 2 years Warranty, free tech support and replacement service; we know you will be pleased with this camera. (All support and services via email at: elinawei0621@outlook.com ). ★ NOTE ★ : THE SYSTEM IS ONLY COMPATIABLE WITH Cars,Sedans,SUVs,Minivans UNDER 21FT VEHICL.
